RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIPARI advanced to the lead at the half edging to daylight on the far turn digging in under outside pressure late becoming weary holding on at the end. MACI'S GEMSTONE went evenly emerging to threaten on the far turn extending outside the leader down the lane wearing down while hanging late. TEST YOUR FAITH steadied briefly on the first turn lagging through the backside, came evenly to upper stretch closing in late on a very weary front end. MORE TO FOLLOW raced evenly tiring on the far turn. TWELVE SHARP sent clear early was caught on the backside wilting abruptly on the far turn. NIKITA folded up early. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF TEST YOUR FAITH AGAINST THE RIDER OF LIPARI FOR INTERFERENCE ON THE OPENING TURN WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Sharp
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, caught backside, wilted abruptly far turn

ENTRY.NAME: More to Follow
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, tired far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Test Your Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief steady first turn, evenly to lane, closed on weary foes

ENTRY.NAME: Nikita
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

ENTRY.NAME: Lipari
ENTRY.COMMENT: advanced to lead backside, clear to lane, dug in, held on weary

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's Gemstone
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, emerged far turn, bid outside the leader lane, hung

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPY CHAMP slow early gave a mild rally on the turn vying three deep in mid stretch clearing late. OVERBEARING stalked the pace rallying in upper stretch bidding willingly along the inside. ENZOEXPRESS broke sharply setting the pace staying clear to upper stretch weakening late between horses. THE FILTER raced evenly to upper stretch lacking surge there on the inside. GOTTAGETITBACK was in tight checking briefly at the break. HIDDEN RULER was always outrun. MAGIC MOUNTAIN gave way on the turn. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF GOTTAGETITBACK AGAINST THE RIDER OF OVERBEARING FOR INTERFERENCE AT THE BREAK WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Enzoexpress
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, dug in lane, weakened between

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: The Filter
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more inside

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Mountain
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Overbearing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied upper stretch, vied inside, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Gottagetitback
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight checked break

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Champ
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally turn, bid three deep lane, went clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 11, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4, 000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNION STATION advanced on the backside drawing even on the turn, took the lead in upper stretch angling out to tighten rival late holding up at the end. PARADE GRAND slow early gave a mild rally on the far turn gaining to threaten outside the leader late being tightened up by said foe in the closing yards. HOBE SOUND went evenly rallying along the inside to upper stretch vying willingly in the path being out finished by wide rivals. RY'S REVENGE sent clear set the pace being hooked on the far turn dueling in upper stretch coming up a bit short along the inside. KNOWN tracked the early pace fading on the far turn. BALTIC FLEET chased early giving way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Hobe Sound
ENTRY.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, rallied inside far turn, bid willingly two path lane

ENTRY.NAME: Known
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked early, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Baltic Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Parade Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally far turn, loomed outside, tightened late

ENTRY.NAME: Union Station
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed turn, led lane, angled out tightened foe

ENTRY.NAME: Ry's Revenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked turn, dueled top lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRUZIN FOR CHAOS surged clear on the turn digging in down the lane holding gamely on the inside in an impressive debut. I'LL SMOKEM chased through the turn into upper stretch closing in willingly late. STANDINGINTHEFIRE slow early gave a mild rally down the lane moving past the others. TWO MORE SHOTS raced evenly throughout lacking more. MANSION PARTY led with early speed being passed on the turn having little left in upper stretch. HEARTFELT KARTER was always outrun. SPIDER PIG trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Heartfelt Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Mansion Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, passed turn, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Cruzin for Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged clear turn, dug in lane, held gamely inside

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Smokem
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased to lane, closed willingly late

ENTRY.NAME: Standinginthefire
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally lane, moved past the others

ENTRY.NAME: Two More Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Spider Pig
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING $6,500 FOR HORSES THAT HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 11 Allowed 3 lbs. C laiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVIL'S CANYON powered to the front on the turn drawing off in upper stretch being kept to the task late as much the best. CHASE LIL ME slow early surged into upper stretch finishing strong on the inside. EXECUTIVE PRIZE slow early lagged to upper stretch passing a few there. SWORD OF DAMOCLES pressed the pace being passed on the turn wilting down the lane. BURR HILL BULLET pressed the pace to mid turn wavering there folding rapidly in upper stretch. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF SWORD OF DAMOCLES AGAINST THE RIDER OF DEVIL,S CANYON CLAIMING INTERFERENCE ON THE TURN WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Chase Lil Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, surged into upper stretch, finished strong inside

ENTRY.NAME: Executive Prize
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, passed a few there

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Canyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: powered to top turn, drew off top lane, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Burr Hill Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sword of Damocles
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUTTON BREEZE pressed the pace wresting a clear on the turn digging in down the lane holding off inside pressure. BANKX TURBO stalked the pace rallying in upper stretch bidding willingly to wire in the four path. SHELTOWEE'S BALI went evenly saving ground to upper stretch vying from the rail hanging late. SPEIGHTY WAR slow early played no factor. TYPE SETTER was never involved. HINK'S PALADIN pressed the pace tiring in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Bankx Turbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied upper stretch, vied willingly four path

ENTRY.NAME: Hink's Paladin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Speighty War
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheltowee's Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, saved ground to lane, vied along the rail, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Sutton Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, clear turn, dug in lane, held driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Type Setter
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 11 Allowed 3 l bs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAVID'S GEM rallied to collar rival on the turn wresting the lead in upper stretch edging off under a drive. RAD PAISLEY gained on the turn giving steady response down the lane finishing a game second best. TWO GUNS slow early lagged to upper stretch mustering a mild response there to move past the rest. EMPEROROFTHEDARK sent clear set the pace being hooked on the turn ceding in upper stretch wearing down along the inside. BLACK CANDY played no factor. PERFETTO was never involved. FEDERALE had brief speed then faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Black Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Federale
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Emperorofthedark
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked turn, wore down lane

ENTRY.NAME: David's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on the turn, wrested lead top lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Rad Paisley
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained on turn, steady surge lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Two Guns
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, moved past the others

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 11, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 11 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4 ,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT ALIBI pressed to lead at the half dueling through the far turn then down the stretch digging deep on the inside of rival to prevail. CHOPPED surged to draw even on the far turn dueling abreast rival down the lane battling to the end. BACK ALLEY CAT slow early lagged to upper stretch finding best stride late to move up. PRETTY STORMY went evenly rallying to press bid on the far turn then weakened in upper stretch. BATTLE CREEK slow early played no factor. KANTPAYTHETOLL stalked the pace chasing on the far turn giving way in upper stretch. GOOD IDEA set the early pace being passed at the half chasing on the far turn tiring in upper stretch. MR HOOVER clipped heels at the head of the stretch losing the rider, walked off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Good Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, passed backside, chased far turn, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Back Alley Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Kantpaythetoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gave way into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Hoover
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Truett Wilbur
ENTRY.COMMENT: clipped heels, lost jockey, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Alibi
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed to lead 1/2, dueled into lane, dug deep inside of foe

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, pressed far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Battle Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Chopped
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged on the far turn, dueled abreast lane, battled to wire
